text: CEGEP is an acronym for , which means "College of General and Professional Education". It is the name for public colleges in Quebec, Canada. It was created in 1967 after the Quiet Revolution in the 1960s, when the provincial government took over the management of health care and education. ==Other websites== *List of Cégep schools *Fédération des cégeps Category:1967 establishments in North America Category:1960s establishments in Canada
title: CEGEP
